name: Photic pelagic - Photic/epipelagic zone - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool
description: Map of estimated water-column integrated primary productivity from Copernicus Reanalysis data developped using OC-CCI algorithm. Known limitations: Only primary productivity is measured, not biodiversity
